summary: A 'small' Player Home made in a few hours for friends, but after some poking and prodding I am opening it up to the community.
descriptionHtml:
A 'small' Player Home made in a few hours for friends, but after some poking and prodding I am opening it up to the community.

Dragon Landing is a grand hall for feasting and preparing for war. There is a door in Whiterun on the left hand side as you go up the path to Dragonsreach.
--- 
Just a quick player house I made for myself and friends, there may be a few ghosts messing with the items. Feel free to let me know if there are any game breaking issues and I will fix those as soon as possible. 

(Havok isn't playing nice and I just can't seem to fix it no matter now much I 'F' things. If anyone has any suggestions I welcome them, just don't be a fool about it and I will be happy to take a look and possibly implement them when I have time.)

---
